reviewText: Like always, jakes uses his powerful gift of exposition to bring out hidden nuggets and truths. A must have dvd.

Based on the passage about Paul when a snake was in the fire wood and when they made a fire, the snake jumped out and bit him, but he just shook it off. Great encouragement if you are going through some tough times
Love this series of teaching..........!

It's amazing how God has gifted Bishop Jakes with the ability to take the ancient Word of God and contextualize it.  Some don't see the relevance of the Word of God for present-day living; so they abandon it.  However, in the hands of a skilled teacher, one's eyes can be opened to just how appropriate the Word is for daily living.  This DVD is powerful in aiding one's understanding when going through hard places in life.  I love it.
Not yet
good
Very inspirational, motivating and uplifting
As always, Bishop T.D. Jakes speaks the word through stories in the Bible that make you understand the word and make it effective in your life.
I enjoyed this sermon. TD Jakes has always made me think about how I was living my life and this tape helped.
Video was great, I would recommend it and I would purchase it again.  Learned a lot, great spiritual teachings.  T.D. Jakes is a great speaker
my Uncle loved them he was very excited after he received them he said They were so wonderful to listen to

Same scripture, different interpretation.  Powerful, Anointed, Knowledgable, and spiritual food that just enlarge ones hunger for the word of God.  I love this one for it speaks to me where I am at in this point in my spiritual journey with God. I am excited.
Wow can only describe the best sermon,I can't explain it but this Man of GOD works he's like a poet never quite finished and takes time to really the understanding
T.D. Jakes brings the heart and spirit of Christ home again with his message "It Will All Come out in the Fire". This message is for all, young and old, in these troubled times.

Not sure if I read description right but it is just a CD of someone reading TD Jakes book and they don't even do a good job of that. Definitely don't get the same emphasis. Just know what you are getting.
I love it and would definitely recommend it to any person who is on transition to a new level in life
this was great and we are enjoying all the items we received with T D Jakes on it thank you

I am so glad I purchased this dvd. Bishop Jakes delivers an inspiring and encouraging message. The dvd was exactly what I purchased and it was new. Also, I would buy from this seller again since I received exactly what I ordered in a timely manner.
Its one of T.D. Jakes best!!!! I find to be quite inspiring and watch it alot!!  I sent one to my daughter so she could watch it. I hope it helps her to understand about why some things happen.
We all know that Bishop Jakes is anointed and anything he does is excellent1 I would encorage anyone to buy this cd.
Using this for my ministry and most importantly for my own family. Very informative and good to watch as a family. Very goooooood
T.D. Jakes is one of the few, or one of the two, evangelists who excite me when I hear them.
If you struggle with knowing why you're going through trials, this is a good sermon for you or for your friends.  Give it a chance and I promise you will be blessed!
In the balance of daily life T.D. Jakes pulls all the stops out in this message to ensure we understand how much God cares for us. Too Good. I like it.
It was delieved as they said described as they said so i couldn't ask for more now i can enjoy it
This sermon is so real and eye opening its crazy. Bishop Jakes brought this word forth with power and authority. I was blessed. I listen to it almost everyday and I always learn something new.

The DVD was delivered in a very timely manner. I was completly surprised however by the quality of the video picture itself. It was so crystal clear it was as though you could reach right into the t.v. and touch Pastor Jakes.  I am anxious to see the next DVD I purchased.
My mother loves it and she can't wait for the next one that I buy for her.

Really enjoyed this.  I have a fairly big collection of TDJakes DVDs and was thrilled to find that Amazon carried some titles I did not yet have.  I appreciate messages that are so rich, you want to hear them again because you want to internalize the content. I also appreciate a message that resonates in me to where I would be prone to watch it even when I was feeling down or vulnerable because there is nothing in it that I feel I need to weed out or disregard. This was definitely one that I could listen to repeatedly at any time.  Well worth getting.

I purchased this and had no idea what he may be speaking on. When you think fire, you think of getting burned or marred. TD is excellent in this dvd. Anything you want removed from your life just let God be God and it will all come out in the fire.

THIS DVD TALKS ABOUT THING'S WE STRUGGLE WITH AND HOW GOD WILL PURGE THEM AWAY AS WE GO THROUGH THE FIRE AND TRIALS OF LIFE. THIS IS A WONDERFUL MESSAGE AND WILL BALANCE YOUR THINKING AND HELP YOU TO LET GO AND LET GOD DO THE WORK THAT ONLY HE CAN DO.
I always enjoy anything to T.d Jake's puts out it's always the word of God and I feel it's what I need and he knows how to bring it forth
encouraging!
Wow, this was an excellent sermon, really spirited preaching.  We loved it.
Great purchase! Definitely worth the price
I gave this away as a gift to my husband.  I am sure that he enjoyed it!
Works great came on time
Awesome as always. Effective message for the believer.
I enjoy it
Great lessons!!!
Great dvd! T.D. Jakes is awesome!
